title: Rugby - The Lions Roar - South Africa
description:
The Lions' Roar
On: BBC 2 Wales (Digital) (102)    
Date: Friday 3rd July 2009 (Already shown)
Time: 10:00 PM to 10:30 PM (30 minutes long)

Shot on the eve of the Lions' rugby union tour to South Africa, this documentary focuses on the sporting and social impact of their 1974 tour to the same country. Featuring previously unseen archive footage, the programme reveals how Gareth Edwards, Phil Bennett, JJ Williams and the rest became heroes to black fans living under apartheid - two of whom would later shape the current Springboks. Narrated by Eddie Butler.
